quotes.quote: Balls are to men what purses are to women.
Beach balls at festivals are the work of the devil.
The tennis ball doesn't know how old I am. The ball doesn't know if I'm a man or a woman or if I come from a communist country or not. Sport has always broken down these barriers.
When you control the ball you control the score.
When you have the ball in your hand, you're the most important guy in the whole organization.
The ball is man's most disastrous invention, not excluding the wheel.
Basketballs dont hold grudges!
Basketball is a pure invention.
Keep all your balls in the air.
It takes some balls to live life to the fullest.
Keep your head on the ball. You've got to hit it first, then look where it goes. People get in trouble when they look for where the ball's going, and they haven't even hit it yet.
Behind every kick of the ball there has to be a thought.
The ball was coming down like a butterfly with sore feet.
It takes balls to execute an innocent man.
The ball is round so that the game can change direction.
If everybody went to balls and did less drugs, itd be a fun world, wouldnt it?
A curve ball is not something you can pick up overnight. It took me years to perfect mine.
Don't throw the ball before you have it.
A charity ball is like a dance except it's tax deductible.
I hit a ball for a living, but I have that passion to keep learning.
